title: The Unchained Slave
description: When the master’s away the slaves will play!That’s certainly what happens when the owner of The Wild Side – London’s hottest Gay BDSM club – goes to New York for a few days and leaves behind his three personal slaves with the task of testing out and launching a potential new worker at club.Plenty of hot group sex and the raunchiest night out ever at THE WILD SIDE!
author: Jack Brighton
